name: Rombo: Zombie Shooter
description:
Get your weapons ready for this ultimate action game. Rombo:Zombie Shooter is totally platform-style 2D action shooting game.
Download now for FREE one of the best Action shooting Zombie games 2D!

Rombo: Zombie Shooter is a free action and adventure game is fairly easy to understand and play, with romboman shot fire through your weapon like a sniper or a Stickman.
Take control of a sniper and clean up the streets of zombie. Killing zombies and stop the zombie assault, with simple movements of your finger you will have to destroy your enemies and grab and collect coins. Drive your Rombo character into a very Action running under hot sky.
You control Rombo while steadily advancing. Have your faucets to draw stylish jumping, air towers and wall jumps to collect coins and reach the finish Parkour line!


• Around the world
Shooting fire through your weapon like a sniper to killing Zombie
